rules_text:
Dormant {1}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for its dormant cost. If you do, it isn't a creature.)[/i]
[i]Paradox[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If it's a nonland permanent card, you may put it into your hand. Otherwise, you may put it into your graveyard.
